items.role: BS Information Technology with Specialization in Mobile and Internet Technologies

projCategory.description: Over the years, I've built and contributed to multiple

projects.title: MuzonEcoSave Reverse Vending Machine (RVM)
projects.description: MuzonEcoSave: Recycables Rewards Machine is an IoT-based recycling machine with touchscreen app that converts plastic bottles to redeemable rewards through QR scanning.
items: Implemented Firebase as the primary database for real-time communication on both machine and web application.
Achieved 90% accuracy in bottle-to-point conversion and improved counting speed by 80%, ensuring 80% operational availability of the reverse vending machine.

projects.title: Sibol: An AI-Powered Planting Application
projects.description: Sibol is an urban farming app powered by Gemini AI that provides a complete end-to-end solution for plant identification, care recommendations, and urban farm setup guidance.
items: A winning entry mobile application submitted in Innolympics: GDSC PLM Hackathon.
Maximizes usage of firebase authentication, firestore, and storage.
Used an open source AI (Gemini) that utilizes image inputs with specific prompts.

projects.title: Pet Adoption Management System
projects.description: Pet Adoption Management System is a full-stack web application that streamlines the pet adoption process for a non-profit organization, Noah's Ark.
items: A complete system with video chat feature, video conferencing and SMS notifications.
Integrated various APIs including JitsiAPI for video calls, GoogleAPI, PH Locations API, Semaphore API for SMS notification and Web3Form API.

Achieved key goals including promptly informing 80% of adopters about their application status, reducing inquiries about adopted pets by 90%, and speed up inquiries related to partnerships, collaborations and donations by 90%.

projects.title: Czarina Cuarez Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio made for showcasing my projects, experiences, and achievements.
items: Implements industry code standard practices learned during my internship.
Focuses on implementing modern design techniques.

achieveCategory.description: Beyond that, my passion for tech has driven me to accomplish these

items.title: Bronze Awardee, StartupQC Finalist
items.description: EcoSave RVM was selected as one of the top 37 finalists in StartupQC Students Edition 2, a business plan competition organized by the Quezon City Government.

items.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
items.description: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner is an entry-level certification that validates foundational cloud knowledge and skills, including AWS services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

items.title: ICINT 2025 Excellent Oral Presentation Award
items.description: Awarded for the excellent oral presentation of our research paper, MuzonEcoSave: Recyclables Recovery Rewarding Machine, at the International Conference on Information Technology (ICINT) 2025.

items.title: First Placer & Most Innovative Solution Award
items.description: QCEcoSave: Reverse Vending Machine, our idea entry, competed with schools across Quezon City and secured an award in Reinventing Cities: Design for Smart and Sustainable Cities at DOST-NCR.

items.title: Champion
items.description: Our entry, Sibol: An AI-Powered Planting Application, won the championship in InnOlympics 2024: GDSC-PLM Hackathon, competing against 30+ schools from various cities.

items.title: ACP Cloud Security
items.description: Alibaba Cloud's Cloud Security Certification (ACP Level - Alibaba Cloud Certified Professional) is a professional technical certification oriented to architects, developers, and O&M personnel that use Alibaba Cloud products.

items.title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2023 Certified Foundations Associate
items.description: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations Associate is a certification that validates foundational knowledge of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services, including core concepts, architecture, and security.

items.title: ACA Cloud Computing
items.description: Alibaba Cloud Certification Associate (ACA - Alibaba Cloud Certification Associate) is a certification designed for those who can use Alibaba Cloud Computing products.
